channel.title: Hidden for a reason
channel.description:
I was alching [hidden] because I can't alch slow enough so I go somewheres and alch where there are no people so I don't get band. People think just because there is an alcher or a theiver that they are the ones massing... So anyways, I was alching there and got banded. I shouldn't of gotten band just because I was hidden... I accidentaly massed because the server lagged and I got mad... But that is no reason to get band!
[size=10pt]The account that was band was called "Peanuckle" [/size]
IP-darkfalls.ath.cx

item.title: Hidden for a reason
item.dc:creator: @SivanScape SivanScape
item.description:
@SivanScape wrote:

banded and band?

dude make some sence please.
say banned and i don’t know
what the heck you’re talking about lol.

Read full topic
